Text:
All Windows 8 Pro media has media center already built in... but... it requires a Windows 8 Media Center Pack product key to activate the Media Center.   

Could you explain how media center is activated with this please.  

Thanks for the UL sowinlibre

For a limited time, get Windows 8 Media Center Pack for free 
http://windows.microsoft.com/en-US/windows-8/feature-packs

This one is acting funny. On more than one machine, with more than one bittorrent client, it would load to around eight or ten percent and then hang. A check of the downloaded folder would indicate a total file size of the full 3.4 gigs, but the included .iso was wonky, and at the given download speeds there was no way the whole thing could have made it in such a short period of time. Not sure what's the matter here, but perhaps another few pairs of eyeballs need to give this one a close looking over.
is this RTM or the original?
